[ar:Ariana Grande]

[00:00.00]NASA - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:00.59]Lyrics by： Tommy Brown/Charles Anderson/Victoria Monet/Tayla Parx/Ariana Grande
[00:01.19]Composed by：Tommy Brown/Charles Anderson/Victoria Monet/Tayla Parx/Ariana Grande
[00:01.79]This is one small step for woman
[00:03.28]One giant leap for woman-kind
[00:10.67]I'd rather be alone tonight
[00:13.19]You can say I love you through the phone tonight
[00:16.40]Really don't wanna be in your arms tonight
[00:19.70]I'll just use my covers to stay warm tonight
[00:22.89]Think I'm better off here all alone tonight
[00:26.00]Ain't no checkin' on when I get home tonight
[00:29.19]Just makin' sure I'm good on my own tonight
[00:32.34]Even though there isn't nothin' wrong tonight
[00:35.87]Yeah I'm just sayin' baby
[00:37.38]I can't really miss you if I'm with you
[00:40.04]And when I miss you it'll change the way I kiss you
[00:43.16]Baby you know time apart is beneficial
[00:46.36]It's like I'm the universe and you'll be N-A-S-A
[00:50.08]Give you the whole world I'ma need space
[00:53.46]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need
[00:56.12]You know I'm a star space I'ma need space
[00:59.60]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need space N-A-S-A
[01:03.02]Give you the whole world I'ma need space
[01:05.99]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need
[01:08.77]You know I'm a star space I'ma need space
[01:12.60]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need space N-A-S-A
[01:15.68]Bottom line
[01:17.36]Usually I would love it if you stayed the night
[01:20.41]I just think I'm on another page tonight
[01:23.61]It ain't nothing wrong with saying I need me time
[01:28.58]Usually I would orbit around you
[01:31.72]But gravity seems to be the only thing that's pulling me
[01:36.61]You'll be my rise and shine soon as them stars align mmm
[01:40.95]Baby I can't really miss you if I'm with you
[01:44.03]And when I miss you it'll change the way I kiss you
[01:47.49]Baby you know time apart is beneficial
[01:50.41]It's like I'm the universe and you'll be N-A-S-A
[01:54.04]Give you the whole world I'ma need space
[01:57.34]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need
[01:59.70]You know I'm a star space I'ma need space
[02:03.63]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need space N-A-S-A
[02:07.01]Give you the whole world I'ma need space
[02:10.14]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need
[02:12.45]You know I'm a star space I'ma need space
[02:16.35]I'ma need space I'ma I'ma need space N-A-S-A
[02:19.84]You don't wanna leave me but I'm tryna self-discover
[02:26.22]Keep me in your orbit and you know you'll drag me under
[02:32.49]You don't wanna leave me but I'm tryna self-discover
[02:35.94]You don't wanna leave me but I'm tryna self-discover
[02:38.89]Keep me in your orbit and you know you'll drag me under
[02:42.35]Keep me in your orbit and you know you'll drag me under
[02:45.33]Alone tonight
[02:50.00]You can say I love you through the phone tonight
data.trans:
[ti:NASA]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.99]//
[00:01.79]对一个女人来说 这是一小步
[00:03.28]对整个女性群体来说 这是一大步
[00:10.67]今晚我宁愿独自一人
[00:13.19]今晚你可以在电话里说我爱你
[00:16.40]今晚真的不想躺在你的怀抱
[00:19.70]今晚我就用我的被子取暖
[00:22.89]我觉得今晚独自一人更好
[00:26.00]我回到家你也不要联系我
[00:29.19]不必确认我一个人好不好
[00:32.34]虽然我们之间没有任何问题
[00:35.87]我只是说说而已
[00:37.38]如果总和你在一起 我就不会思念你
[00:40.04]只有思念你 我才会更想吻你
[00:43.16]宝贝 你知道 偶尔分开一段时间是有好处的
[00:46.36]就像我是浩瀚宇宙 而你是航天员
[00:50.08]把整个地球都给你 把太空留给我
[00:53.46]我需要一点空间
[00:56.12]你知道我就像星星 把太空留给我
[00:59.60]我需要一点空间 把太空留给我
[01:03.02]把整个地球都给你 把太空留给我
[01:05.99]我需要一点空间
[01:08.77]你知道我就像星星 把太空留给我
[01:12.64]我需要一点空间 把太空留给我
[01:15.68]总之
[01:17.36]通常你晚上留下来我会很开心
[01:20.41]我只是觉得今晚要稍微改变一下
[01:23.61]我说需要时间 并不是说我们之间出了问题
[01:28.58]通常我会以你为中心
[01:31.72]但天性是我无法控制的东西
[01:36.61]只要星星连成线 你就会成为我的阳光
[01:40.95]宝贝 如果总和你在一起 我就不会思念你
[01:44.03]只有思念你 我才会更想吻你
[01:47.49]宝贝 你知道 偶尔分开一段时间是有好处的
[01:50.41]就像我是浩瀚宇宙 而你是航天员
[01:54.04]把整个地球都给你 把太空留给我
[01:57.34]我需要一点空间
[01:59.70]你知道我就像星星 把太空留给我
[02:03.63]我需要一点空间 把太空留给我
[02:07.01]把整个地球都给你 把太空留给我
[02:10.14]我需要一点空间
[02:12.45]你知道我就像星星 把太空留给我
[02:16.35]我需要一点空间 把太空留给我
[02:19.84]你不想离开我 但我在寻找自我
[02:26.22]把我困在你的身边 只会让我失去自我
[02:32.49]你不想离开我 但我在寻找自我
[02:35.94]你不想离开我 但我在寻找自我
[02:38.89]把我困在你的身边 只会让我失去自我
[02:42.35]把我困在你的身边 只会让我失去自我
[02:45.33]今晚独自一人
[02:50.00]今晚你可以在电话里说我爱你
